entry.title: UModeler
entry.content:
Model and Sketch your World in Unity.

Limited-Time Bundle Savings


Take this opportunity to grab UModeler at a discounted price during the Awards Sale in January and upgrade to UModeler X Plus Cost-effectively!


  • During 50% off (Jan.16.2025 ~ Jan.30.2025): UModeler ($62.5) + upgrade to X Plus ($99) = $161.5 (19% less than buying X Plus alone)

You'll save up to 19% compared to buying UModeler X Plus directly at $199



UModeler provides you with the most convenient environment for low-poly 3D modeling and prototyping within Unity.


Website | Unity Discussions | Manual | Tutorial Videos | Discord | Facebook |

Release Note | Contact.Support@umodeler.com


THINGS TO KNOW


  • Watch UModeler Essentials Videos, narrated by Indie Game Hustle
  • Finalist for "Best Development Tool" at Unity Awards 2018
  • Includes the PastelTown-BuiltInRP-UModeler package as a default demo asset
  • Streamlined and reliable Prefab workflow, starting from UModeler version 2.9.18
  • Minimum Unity version required to use UModeler is 2019.4.x
  • UModeler doesn't support the runtime API and editing.


ARTICLES


  • Modeling Moonglow Village in Unity with UModeler [80.lv]
  • Level Design in Unity: Witchâ€™s Cauldron [80.lv]
  • Level Design in Unity: Blocking Out a Cyberpunk Scene with UModeler [80.lv]
  • Modeling a Mech Robot in Unity with UModeler [80.lv]
  • UModeler for Unity [80.lv]


FEATURES


1) No need for export & import processes to create your world anymore.

â€¢ Edit and manipulate 3D meshes directly within Unity, in the final environment context.

â€¢ See shader/VFX results instantly whenever you modify a base mesh.

â€¢ Modify and tweak meshes made with external DCC software (such as Blender, 3ds Max, Maya, etc.) right in Unity.


2) Sketch-Based 3D Modeling Technique

â€¢ Various drawing tools and the PushPull tool allow for intuitive 3D shape creation.

â€¢ Quickly prototype your level using this feature.


3) Comprehensive 3D Modeling Tools and UV Editor

â€¢ Quickly create 3D assets and levels with nearly 150 versatile tools.

â€¢ UModeler features adjustable 3D primitive shapes for added flexibility.

â€¢ Unwrap any mesh and edit UVs directly in Unity with the built-in UV Editor.

â€¢ New Feature: Hotspot texturing is now available!


4) High Compatibility with other Unity Assets

â€¢ ProBuilder: Smooth conversion of ProBuilder meshes.

â€¢ Polybrush: Seamlessly edit UModeler meshes with Polybrush.

â€¢ Synty Studio's 3D Assets: Convert 3D meshes into UModeler and edit them seamlessly.

â€¢ Surforge: Fully compatible with PBR texturing.

â€¢ And more


5) Extensive Learning Materials and Active Online Communities

â€¢ Narrated tutorial videos for both beginners and intermediate users.

â€¢ Comprehensive 'Timeline' and 'Full-making' videos demonstrating 3D asset modeling with UModeler.

â€¢ Engage with a vibrant community on Discord and the Unity Forum. Ask questions, share insights, or showcase your art.


6) Who Can Benefit from UModeler?

â€¢ Level Designers

â€¢ 3D Modelers

â€¢ Concept Artists

â€¢ Technical Artists (TAs)

â€¢ VFX Artists

â€¢ Programmers

â€¢ Indie Game Developers

â€¢ And more


If you want to know the lastest information, visit our blog post: https://docs.umodeler.com/blog/umodeler-x-2025-jan-news/

entry.title: POLYGON Modular Fantasy Hero Characters - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty
entry.content:
â—¼ Synty Discord Community â—¼

Jump in to our Discord to Learn, Create and Share!


Synty Studiosâ„¢ Presents -

POLYGON - Modular Fantasy Hero Characters

A low poly Modular Character asset pack to create characters for your fantasy game or make a character creator for your players to make their own hero.


â—¼ Key Features â—¼

- 720 modular pieces with a custom shader to change colors

- Demo scene included with random character generator script

- Male and Female versions of each body part (not including unisex parts)

- Capes rigged to work with Dynamic Bone

- 120 Premade characters from the modular parts (5 Presets for Fixed scale character)

- Static versions for in game pick ups and use for UI etc


â—¼ Assets â—¼

Modular Character Assets

- Hair, Heads, Eyebrows, Facial Hair, Hats, Masks, Helmets, Torsos, Hips, Legs, Arms, Hands, Knee pads, Shoulder pads, Elbow Pads, Hip Attachments, Bags, Capes etc


Weapon Assets

- Axe, Dagger, Jousts, Maces, Shields, Shields, Staffs, Swords, Knives etc


â—¼ Compatibility â—¼

- Supports Universal Render Pipeline (URP) - URP Guide Here

- Characters are setup to work with Mecanim (no animations included in this pack)

entry.title: Runtime Transform Handles
entry.content:
Runtime Transform Handles are the runtime 3D controls that are used to manipulate GameObjects in the scene.

Runtime Transform Handles are the runtime 3D controls used to manipulate GameObjects in the scene. There are three built-in transform tools for positioning, rotating, and scaling objects via the transform component. Supplementary controls, such as the scene gizmo and grid, allow for changing the viewing angle and projection mode, and for showing the grid in the scene. Other important components include the selection component, scene component, and handles component, which allow for selecting objects, navigating the scene, and changing the appearance of transform handles.


Documentation | Telegram


This is lite version of Runtime Editor


Features:

â™¥ Positon handle,

â™¥ Rotation handle;

â™¥ Scale handle;

â™¥ Grid;

â™¥ Box Selection;

â™¥ Selection gizmo;

â™¥ Align to Grid & Vertex snapping;

â™¥ Scene navigation;

â™¥ Global & Local coordinates;

â™¥ Undo & Redo;

â™¥ Touch support;

â™¥ Multi-camera support;

entry.title: POLYGON Western Frontier - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty
entry.content:
â—¼ Synty Discord Community â—¼

Jump in to our Discord to Learn, Create and Share!


Synty Studiosâ„¢ presents -


An Epic Low Poly asset pack of characters, props, weapons, vehicles and environment assets to create a western themed polygonal style game.


A great addition to POLYGON - Western Pack


Key Features -

329 unique assets with x4 alternative texture colors.


Assets

- Building assets (x42), Environment assets (x147), FX (x5), Generic assets (x9), Props assets (x87)


Vehicles (x3)

- Wagon Jail, Wagon Shop, Wagon Travel.


Characters (x21)

- Bandit Male, Captain Male, Gold miner Male, Gold miner Male, Hunter Male, Mexican Female, Mexican Male 01, Mexican Male 02, Native American Female 01, Native American Chief Male 01, Native American Elder Female 01, Native American Warrior Female 01, Native American Warrior Male 01, Native American Warrior Male 02, Native American Warrior Male 03, Priest Male 01, Salesman Male 01, Soldier Male 01, Thug Male 01, Thug Male 02, Traveler Female 01.

(with Alternative Colors)


Weapons (x15)

- Axe, Chain-gun, Gun stock, Hammer, Knife, Pickaxe, Revolver, Rifles, Rifle Bayonet, Rifle Stack, Shotgun, Spade, Spear, Sword.

- Heaps of awesome content included (see the layout screenshots for more details)


Check out our other Assets
